mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into grade_warning (sno, sname, class_code, major_code, department_code, grade, course_name, course_code, course_grade, wno, wname, w_department_code, created, updated, school_year, school_term) values (#{sno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wDepartmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{schoolYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update grade_warning set sno = #{sno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sname = #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_code = #{classCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major_code = #{majorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_code = #{departmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_name = #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_code = #{courseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_grade = #{courseGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wno = #{wno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wname = #{wname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_department_code = #{wDepartmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, school_year = #{schoolYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school_term = #{schoolTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, sno, sname, class_code, major_code, department_code, grade, course_name, course_code, course_grade, wno, wname, w_department_code, created, updated, school_year, school_term from grade_warning where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, sno, sname, class_code, major_code, department_code, grade, course_name, course_code, course_grade, wno, wname, w_department_code, created, updated, school_year, school_term from grade_warning

select sname as xm,sno as xh,school_year as nj, department_code as xy,major_code as zy,count(sno) as yjsm from grade_warning where id not in (select attendance_warnings_id from feedback_records where type = 'grade') and department_code = #{xy} and school_year = #{xn} and school_term = #{xq} GROUP BY sno
